word_mean: 溶解：细胞被特定溶解素所破坏
分解：由特定作用物使化合物分解
松解术：使粘连器官分离
减退：疾病症状逐渐减轻。参见crisis

sentence.Network_en: At high calcium concentration they fuse without lysis.
sentence.Network_cn: 在钙离子浓度高时,他们融合而不解体.

sentence.Network_en: The virions are released by lysis of the host cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过裂解,可以使新的病毒体从宿主细胞中释放出来.

sentence.Network_en: The lysis of the brain takes place only hours after death.
sentence.Network_cn: 脑的细胞溶解,在死后的几小时就发生了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... lyse v. 溶解，溶化 lysis n. 溶解；消散；(疾病)渐退 macroscopical a． 宏观的；肉眼可见的.
考博英语词汇 ... lyse v. 溶解，溶化 lysis n. 溶解；消散；(疾病)渐退 macroscopical a． 宏观的；肉眼可见的.
生物学词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... lysine decarboxylase 赖氨酸脱羧酶 lysis 溶菌 lysogen 细胞溶素原.
lysis的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... n.溶解(消散,病的渐退) lysis n.溶解,溶化,溶胞 lysis n.溶解;n.溶解,消散 lysis.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin, from Greek lusis 'loosening', from luein 'loosen'

means.word_mean: 1. recuperation in which the symptoms of an acute disease gradually subside
2. (biochemistry) dissolution or destruction of cells such as blood cells or bacteria

auth_sentence.content: In photosynthesis there is a photochemical lysis of water catalysed by chlorophylls.
auth_sentence.res_content: In photosynthesis there is a photochemical lysis of water catalysed by chlorophylls.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In photosynthesis there is a photochemical lysis of water catalysed by chlorophylls.
